mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PW, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_NICKNAME, MEMBER_GENDER, MEMBER_BIRTH, MEMBER_ADDR, MEMBER_MONEY,MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_PHONE, MEMBER_ROLL, MEMBER_DRIVEACC, MEMBER_DELFLAG, MEMBER_REGDATE FROM DONCAR_MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{id } AND MEMBER_PW = #{pw } AND MEMBER_DELFLAG = 'N'

SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_NICKNAME, MEMBER_GENDER, MEMBER_BIRTH, MEMBER_ADDR, MEMBER_MONEY,MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_PHONE, MEMBER_ROLL, MEMBER_DRIVEACC, MEMBER_DELFLAG, MEMBER_REGDATE FROM DONCAR_MEMBER ORDER BY MEMBER_NO DESC

SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_NICKNAME, MEMBER_GENDER, MEMBER_BIRTH, MEMBER_ADDR, MEMBER_MONEY,MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_PHONE, MEMBER_ROLL, MEMBER_DRIVEACC, MEMBER_DELFLAG, MEMBER_REGDATE FROM DONCAR_MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_DELFLAG = 'N'
